May I know what‚Äôs DCA means? I m thinking to open syfe acc also.. I saw advertised 3.8% guarantee

Dollar Cost Average (DCA) - You buy the same dollar amount (e.g. $500) every month. This means that when its high  you buy fewer shares and when its low  you buy more shares. Over the long term  it should give you a lower average cost.Maybe Chris has a video on this haha
